data.name: XUpdateInformationProvider
desc: Objects implementing this interface provide access to the xml root of one or more update information files for a given set of URLs.

methods.name: cancel
desc: interrupts a getUpdateInformation call and let's it return immediately.

methods.name: getUpdateInformation
desc: get update information for a specific extension or all available information from a repository.

methods.name: getUpdateInformationEnumeration
desc: get update information for a specific extension or all available information from a repository.

methods.name: setInteractionHandler
desc: Sets an interaction handler to be used for further operations.
A default interaction handler is available as service com.sun.star.task.InteractionHandler. The documentation of this service also contains further information about the interaction handler concept.
